title: A mirrour of loue, which such light doth giue, that all men may learne, how to loue and liue. Compiled and set furth by Myles Hogarde seruaunt to the quenes highnesse
author: Huggarde, Miles.
publisher: By Robert Caly within the precinct of the late dissolued house of the gray Freers, nowe conuerted to an hospital called Christes hospital],
